words.sentence: 素早い茶色の狐はのろまな犬を飛び越える
words.typeString: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

words.sentence: 災いのもと
words.typeString: The kiss of death

words.sentence: そんなの大したことないよ！
words.typeString: It's just a storm in a teacup!

words.sentence: 学問に王道なし
words.typeString: There is no royal road to learning.

words.sentence: 失敗は成功の母
words.typeString: Failure teaches success.

words.sentence: やるんだったら今でしょ。
words.typeString: Never put off till tomorrow what can be done today.

words.sentence: 花より団子
words.typeString: The belly is not filled with fair words.

words.sentence: 犬も歩けば棒に当たる
words.typeString: The dog that trots about finds a bone.

words.sentence: 五十歩百歩
words.typeString: A miss is as good as a mile.

words.sentence: 雨降って地固まる
words.typeString: After rain comes fair weather.

words.sentence: 後の祭り
words.typeString: It's too late to call back yesterday.

words.sentence: 悪銭身につかず
words.typeString: Ill got, ill spent.

words.sentence: 私には夢がある（キング牧師）
words.typeString: I have a dream today!

words.sentence: 毎日を新鮮な気持ちで生きてみよう（ヘミングウェイ）
words.typeString: Every day is a new day.

words.sentence: 身に着けているもので人生を語れる
words.typeString: Dressing is a way of life.

words.sentence: 知は力なり（フランシス・ベーコン）
words.typeString: Knowledge is power.

words.sentence: ハングリーであれ。愚か者であれ（スティーブ・ジョブス）
words.typeString: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.

words.sentence: 幸せかどうかは心の持ち次第（アリストテレス）
words.typeString: Happiness depends upon ourselves.

words.sentence: お誕生日おめでとう！
words.typeString: Happy birthday!

words.sentence: ツインルーム、2泊宿泊で予約しました。
words.typeString: I reserved a twin room for two nights.

words.sentence: 感謝申し上げます。
words.typeString: We really appreciate it.

words.sentence: 敬具
words.typeString: Sincerely yours

words.sentence: あなたの提出を受理いたしました。
words.typeString: We have received your submission.

words.sentence: カンファレンスでお会いできることを楽しみにしております
words.typeString: We are looking forward to seeing you at the conference.

words.sentence: 昨日の講義においてトラブルが発生しました
words.typeString: There was a problem with the lecture yesterday.

words.sentence: 誰かがあなたのアカウントにサインインしたようです。
words.typeString: Someone signed-in to your account.

words.sentence: お心当たりがあれば、このメッセージを無視してください。
words.typeString: If this was you, you can disregard this message.

words.sentence: 質問があれば、ご連絡ください。
words.typeString: If you have any questions, please contact us.
